A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I knew what I was walking into\, and it was about what I had expected. Just ok. 

I really don't care for this story line\, they would have been better off following the fan fiction than throwing it all out the window for a poorly devised one in the name of "something new". If thats what they wanted\, why not bring in some of the more prominent fan fiction writers to be part of the process? 

That being said\, the visuals are pretty awesome\, and the characters are likable. Curious what's next\, I don't really think Kylo makes a very convincing sith Lord\, hopefully they bring in something darker\, more sinister\, like the Sith Lords of the old republic.
